rukus.text: Wo que yi chuangzao ren, wo zhidao ta xinzhong de wangxiang; wo bi ta de mingmai hai jin yu ta
Dang zuo zai youbian he zuobian de liang ge jilu de tianshi jilu geren de yanxing de shihou
ta mei shuo yiju hua, ta mianqian dou you tianshi dangchang jiancha
Lin si de hunmi, jiang zhaoshi zhenli. Zhe shi ni yixiang suo taobi de
haojiao jiang chui xiang, na shi jinggao shixian zhi ri
Mei ge ren dou yao daolai, quzhu de tianshi he jianzheng de tianshi, jiang yu ta tongxing
Ni que shuhu ci shi, xianzai wo yi jie kai ni de mengbi, suoyi ni jinri de yanguang shi ruili de
Ta de huoban jiang shuo:“Zhe zai wo mianqian shi xiancheng de.”
Ni lia suo yingdang touru huo yu de, shi mei ge gufu zhe, wangu zhe
qianlin zhe, guofen zhe, huaiyi zhe
yi bie de shenling yu an la tong shou chongbai zhe; ni lia jiang ta touru yanli de xingfa ba
Ta de huoban jiang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo meiyou shi ta fangdang, dan ta zi xianyu bu jin qingli de mi wu zhong.”
Zhujiang shuo:“Nimen buyao zai wo mianqian zhenglun, wo que yi yuxian jinggao nimenle
Wo de panci, shi buke biangeng de, wo jue bushi kui wang zhong pu de.”
